title: Affordable $12.99 ESP32-S3 Gizmo with Compact USB Flash Drive Form-Factor

title: Low Profile Radxa X2L SBC Featuring Intel J4125 and RP2040 Microcontroller
description: The Radxa X2L, powered by the Intel Celeron Processor J4125, is a compact yet robust mini-computer designed to cater to a wide range of computing needs.
